verses.text: And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Timnath|strong="H8553"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* in \w Timnath|strong="H8553"\w* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

And he came \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* in \w Timnath|strong="H8553"\w* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: now therefore \w get|strong="H3947"\w* her for me to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

Then his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Is there\add* \w never|strong="H0369"\w* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* among the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, or among all my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that thou \w goest|strong="H1980"\w* to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*? And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w Get|strong="H3947"\w* her for me; for she pleaseth me \w well|strong="H3474"\w*.\f + \fr 14.3 \ft pleaseth…: Heb. is right in mine eyes\f*

But his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not that it \add was\add* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that he \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* an \w occasion|strong="H8385"\w* against the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: for at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* had \w dominion|strong="H4910"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ Then \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, to \w Timnath|strong="H8553"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* of \w Timnath|strong="H8553"\w*: and, behold, a \w young|strong="H3715"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w roared|strong="H7580"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* him.\f + \fr 14.5 \ft against…: Heb. in meeting him\f*

And the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came \w mightily|strong="H6743"\w* upon him, and he \w rent|strong="H8156"\w* him as he would have \w rent|strong="H8156"\w* a \w kid|strong="H1423"\w*, and \add he had\add* \w nothing|strong="H3972"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: but he \w told|strong="H5046"\w* not his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* or his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* what he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.
And he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*; and she \w pleased|strong="H3474"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w well|strong="H3474"\w*.

¶ And after a \w time|strong="H3117"\w* he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* her, and he turned \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w carcase|strong="H4658"\w* of the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*: and, behold, \add there was\add* a \w swarm|strong="H5712"\w* of \w bees|strong="H1682"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* in the \w carcase|strong="H1472"\w* of the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H7287"\w* thereof in his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, and went \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w eating|strong="H0398"\w*, and \w came|strong="H1980"\w* to his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them, and they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: but he \w told|strong="H5046"\w* not them that he had \w taken|strong="H7287"\w* the \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* out of the \w carcase|strong="H1472"\w* of the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*.

¶ So his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*: and \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* there a \w feast|strong="H4960"\w*; for so used the young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.
And it came to pass, when they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* him, that they \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w companions|strong="H4828"\w* to be with him.

¶ And \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I will now put \w forth|strong="H2330"\w* a \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w* unto you: if ye can \w certainly|strong="H5046"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* it me within the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w feast|strong="H4960"\w*, and find \add it\add* \w out|strong="H4672"\w*, then I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w sheets|strong="H5466"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w change|strong="H2487"\w* of \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*:\f + \fr 14.12 \ft sheets: or, shirts\f*

But if ye \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* me, then shall ye \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w sheets|strong="H5466"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w change|strong="H2487"\w* of \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*. And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Put \w forth|strong="H2330"\w* thy \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w*, that we may \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* it.\f + \fr 14.13 \ft sheets: or, shirts\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Out of the \w eater|strong="H0398"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w meat|strong="H3978"\w*, and out of the \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w sweetness|strong="H4966"\w*. And they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not in \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w expound|strong="H5046"\w* the \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w*.

And it came to pass on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samson’s|strong="H8123"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w Entice|strong="H6601"\w* thy \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, that he may \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* unto us the \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w*, lest we \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* thee and thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: have ye \w called|strong="H7121"\w* us to take that we \w have|strong="H3423"\w*? \add is it\add* not \add so\add*?\f + \fr 14.15 \ft take…: Heb. possess us, or, impoverish us?\f*

And \w Samson’s|strong="H8123"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* before him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou dost but \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me, and \w lovest|strong="H0157"\w* me not: thou hast put \w forth|strong="H2330"\w* a \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and hast not \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* me. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Behold, I have not \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* nor my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and shall I \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* thee?

And she \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* before him the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, while their \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w lasted|strong="H1961"\w*: and it came to pass on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that he \w told|strong="H5046"\w* her, because she lay \w sore|strong="H6693"\w* upon him: and she \w told|strong="H5046"\w* the \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of her \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 14.17 \ft the seven…: or, the rest of the seven days\f*

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* before the \w sun|strong="H2775"\w* went \w down|strong="H0935"\w*, What \add is\add* \w sweeter|strong="H4966"\w* than \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*? and what \add is\add* \w stronger|strong="H5794"\w* than a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w If|strong="H3884"\w* ye had not \w plowed|strong="H2790"\w* with my \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w*, ye had not found \w out|strong="H4672"\w* my \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w*.

¶ And the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H6743"\w* upon him, and he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Ashkelon|strong="H0831"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of them, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* their \w spoil|strong="H2488"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w change|strong="H2487"\w* of garments unto them which \w expounded|strong="H5046"\w* the \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w*. And his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w*, and he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 14.19 \ft spoil: or, apparel\f*
But \w Samson’s|strong="H8123"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* was \add given\add* to his \w companion|strong="H4828"\w*, whom he had used as his \w friend|strong="H7462"\w*.
